page.title: 07LIFE STYLES
page.content: People visiting our village often say,"But what do you do in the winter ?" It is true that most of the population are involved in some way with the tourist industry but we do have our own lives to lead! Much of the winter season is spent preparing for the influx of Summer visitors such as painting, decorating adapting buildings. However socially many clubs and evening activities begin when the visitors leave. In this village badminton,bowls,darts,tennis are just some of the activities which occupy us. The local Hotel has a bar which is open all year round for locals and Discos are often held in church halls or hotels for the younger adults. Often these events involve a lot of travelling for the participants, this is something one gets used to living in a rural area.
